subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: With an unlikely size and an improbable location, Miami of Ohio is sitting on top of the college hockey world with a No. 1 ranking in the polls and a 13-1 record entering Saturday night’s game.
snippet: With an unlikely size and an improbable location, Miami of Ohio is sitting on top of the college hockey world with a No. 1 ranking in the polls and a 13-1 record entering Saturday night’s game.
